snippet: After four seasons of challenging pieces like patterned pajama sets and over-the-top quilted coats, the Northern Irish designer J. W. Anderson has come down to earth - at least a little - for his first prefall collection.
abstract: After four seasons of challenging pieces like patterned pajama sets and over-the-top quilted coats, the Northern Irish designer J. W. Anderson has come down to earth - at least a little - for his first prefall collection.
